name: Upload a new user into LinkedIn Matched Audiences from a new lead in Bitrix24
description:
This template regularly checks for new leads in Bitrix24 and uses the retrieved information to upload new users into LinkedIn Matched Audiences.

While this template appears to be very complicated, don't be afraid - you mainly need to set up your connections.

Please note that the template will only work when there is an associated contact with your new lead. 

For the best performance, your contacts should have these fields filled out:
1) First name
2) Last name
3) Email

Having the deal or the contact associated to a company in Bitrix24 will also improve match rates on LinkedIn, however it's not mandatory for this template to work.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
